Subskills.name: Bow & String
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by multishot.

Subskills.name: Clear Mind
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of multishot.

Subskills.name: Tornadoshot
Subskills.description: Multishot now unleashes a cycloning tornado of projectiles on hit that are launched in all directions.

Subskills.name: Steady Aim
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using multishot.

Subskills.name: Stacked Quiver
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of multishot projectiles.

Subskills.name: Agile Marksman
Subskills.description: Decreases the movement diminish when using multishot.

Subskills.name: Wounding Impact
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Wounded Target
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Raining Inferno
Subskills.description: Multishot now fires burning arrows inflicting burning for a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Ambush
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike chance when using multishot.

Subskills.name: Headshot
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt when using multishot.

Subskills.name: Longshot
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of multishot.

Subskills.name: Arrow Nova
Subskills.description: Multishot now fires a decreased amount of projectiles which when landing or hitting a monster split into multiple projectiles flying in all directions.

Subskills.name: Concentration Volley
Subskills.description: Multishot now fires a decreased amount of shotgunning projectiles in a narrow cone with decreased damage.
